name: Quicksand Treasure Hunter (I)
achievementgroup: Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series I

stage1.title: Quicksand Treasure Hunter (I)
stage1.description: Open a total of 60 treasure chests in Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.

stage2.title: Quicksand Treasure Hunter (I)
stage2.description: Open a total of 120 treasure chests in Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.

stage3.title: Quicksand Treasure Hunter (I)
stage3.description: Open a total of 240 treasure chests in Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.
